_header: Ravished was I that well was me
_description: A song on the Princess Mary’s dancing with her father Henry VIII — six quatrains

BodAsh176.First Lines:
Ravyssed was I that well was meo lord to me so fayneto see
                    þat sight that I dyd see I longe full sore ageyne…
BodAsh176.Last Lines:
…and send her shortlye a Brotherto be englandes right
                    heire
BodAsh176.Editions:
Wright,  Thomas,  and  James Orchard Halliwell-Phillipps, eds.  
             Reliquiae Antiquae.
         2 vols. London: Smith, 1845: 1.258.
